directions: In a 5 quart slow cooker, combine the peas, water, sausage, bouillon, carrot, celery, potatoes, garlic powder, oregano, bay leaves, and onion.
Cover, and cook on High for 4 to 5 hours. Remove bay leaves before ladling into bowls.
ingredients: 1 pound smoked sausage of your choice, sliced
title: Slow Cooker Split Pea Sausage Soup
